message: Fair 60-40 split. Accept and let's be friends!
Your split was a bit too much in your favor. How about we meet in the middle? This offer is better for me than waiting.
Counteroffer. I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bit more.
This is a very reasonable offer, Alice. I'm being quite generous, considering the time pressure and the fact that the money is losing value for you.
I'm willing to meet you closer to the middle, but I still think I can get a better deal.
Alice, the clock is ticking, and this is a very fair offer.  I'm being very patient, but I won't be able to offer you this much longer.
